Trabalha na sociedade de Aguas de Namaacha a mais de 6 anos como operador de máquinas onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da casa. Com este empréstimo pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, tijoleiras e mais para dar continuidade da sua obra. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior e terminar a sua obra.
texts.en:
Agaissa was born in Namaacha, in the Maputo province of Mozambique. He is 24 years old and is single, and no one depends on him financially. 

Agaissa has worked for more than five years at the Namaacha water utility as a machine operator, earning money that he uses to cover his household expenses. With this loan he would like to buy materials like sand, cement and large bricks in order to continue with a home construction project. This is his second loan with Hluvuku [Kiva Field Partner].

In the future, he would like to finish the construction project and continue studying through college.

loans.use: buy materials like sand, cement and large bricks in order to continue with a home construction project.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy food such as rice, salt, red oil, onions, etc. to resell

loans.name: Franciscah

texts.en: Franciscah is a married woman. She has 1 child. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a retail business, where she sells tomatoes and bananas. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be financial problems. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of tomatoes and bananas. Her business goal is to have more businesses within 5 years. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: buy more tomatoes and bananas to sell

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lilian de 33 años de edad, estudió tercer año de bachillerato , está acompañada y tiene tres hijos, los primeros 2 estudian en la escuela del cantón su compañero trabaja en la agricultura y cuido del ganado.


Lilian trabaja en las labores agrícolas y en la cría de ganado desde hace 10  años, esto lo aprendió con su compañero de vida, ya que no tienen la oportunidad  de encontrar un empleo formal, es por ello que haciendo sus cultivos y cuidando sus animales se ganan la vida.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar  4 novillos, para engordarlos en repasto, lo que vendrá a ayudar a conseguir alguna ganancia para el sustento diario de su familia.
 

Los sueños de Lilian son ahorrar para darle el estudio a sus hijos hasta que se gradúen como profesionales y pagar el préstamo para así siempre tener las puertas abiertas.
texts.en:
Lilian is 33 years old. Her highest level of education is three years of high school. She lives with her partner and has three children. The two oldest go the local school. Her partner works farming and taking care of their cattle.

Lilian has been working as a farmer and cattle rancher for ten years. She learned the work alongside her life partner. Since they were not able to find formal employment, they make their living caring for their crops and animals.

She will use the loan she is requesting from CrediCampo to buy four steers, which she will fatten on pasture. This will help her make a profit for her family's daily expenses.
 
Lilian's goal is to save money so that her children can have an education, graduate and have professional careers. She also wants to pay back the loan in order to always have open doors.

loans.use: to buy four steers.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is a married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself as determined. She operates a retail business where she sells tomatoes, bananas and other groceries. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy tomatoes and other groceries to resell. Her business goal is to open another retail shop within 5 years. She hopes that in the future she will buy a piece of land. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy tomatoes and other groceries ro sell

loans.name: Horim

texts.ru: Хорим мужчина в возрасте 37 лет, женат и имеет 2 детей. Хорим живет в отдаленном от города селе и занимается откормом и продажей скота. Хорим с детства со своим братом начал пасти скот. За определенную плату они с братом пасли скот соседей, пока те работали на полях. У Хорима неполное среднее образование и у него не было возможности получить достойное образование. Сейчас Хорим самостоятельно занимается откормом и продажей скота. Он покупает и откармливает скот для дальнейшей его продажи. Хорим на вырученные деньги начал строить дом для себя и семьи. На данный момент в связи с сезонностью у Хорима не очень хорошо идет бизнес и он переживает, что не сможет закончить стройку до наступления холодов. С этой проблемой он обратился в «Арванд» за поддержкой. На полученный  кредит  он хочет закончить стройку и заселиться в новом доме. Планирует купить строительные материалы. Хорим благодарен таким организациям как  «Арванд»  за финансовую помощь малоимущих слоев населения сельских местностей.
texts.en: Horim is 37 years old, married and has two children. He lives in a remote village and raises cattle for meat. As a child, he started with his brother to pasture cattle. For a small fee he and his brother would take the neighboring livestock into the meadows while their neighbors worked in the fields. Horim never finished high school and he had no opportunity to receive formal education. Instead Horim is now an independent rancher who raises meat cattle and resells them at the market. Recently Horim used the savings from his business to build a new house for his family. But, due to seasonality of animal sales, Horim's business is currently not as profitable and he is worried that he will not be able to finish the house before the cold weather arrives. He has turned to "Arvand" with this problem. He will use the loan to finish building the house and move his family into the new building. Horim plans to use the loan to purchase building supplies. He is very grateful to "Arvand" for providing financial assistance to the low income residents of the rural Tajikistan.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Olmas

texts.ru: Олмас уже в третий раз обращается в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом по линии КИВА. Предыдущий кредит был выплачен своевременно и полностью. Доходы от предыдущих кредитов позволили Олмас начать строительство дома, теперь она обращается за кредитом в сумме 63,000 сом (KGS) для завершения строительства. Ей осталось приобрести деревянные балки для того, чтобы накрыть крышу и положить полы в доме. Ежемесячные доходы Олмас от ведения бизнеса увеличились, на сегодняшний день, они составляют в среднем 15,000 сом (KGS). Олмас очень благодарна Фоду КИВА и всем инвесторам и надеется на будущее сотрудничество.
texts.en: Olmas has turned to "Bai-Tushum" bank for the third time.  Her previous loan was paid back in full and on time. Profits from the previous loan helped Olmas start building her new house, and now she is requesting a loan of 63,000 som (KGS) to finish the project. She needs to purchase lumber to cover her roof and install floors in the house. Monthly profits from her business have increased and are now 15,000 som (KGS). Olmas is very grateful to KIVA and all the investors and hopes to be able to collaborate in the future.

loans.use: to finish building her house by purchasing lumber

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru:
Дилором 38-летняя женщина проживающая в районе Муминабад, города Куляб. Дилором очень ответственный человек. Она имеет среднее образование. Дилором более восьми лет занимается животноводством. Кроме того у нее имеется дополнительный доход от растениеводства. Она выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Дилором является матерью двоих славных детей. Ее дочь и сын учатся в средней школе. На данный период времени Дилором занимается сбором травы для скота. Она целый день проводит на поле, косит траву чтобы запастись кормом скота на зиму. 
Дилором берет кредит в основном для закупа телят и посева небольшого урожая овощей.
texts.en: Dilorom is a 38 year old woman and a resident of Muminobad region. Dilorom is a very responsible person. She has a high school degree and has been raising livestock for eight years. She also supplements her income by growing crops. Dilorom is a mother of two wonderful children. Both her son and her daughter are in high school. Currently Dilorom is harvesting hay for her cattle - she spends all day in the fields mowing the hay to have enough feed for her animals through the winter. Dilorom is asking for a loan to purchase calves and to plan a small crop of vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and plant vegetables

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
Armando lleva toda la vida viviendo en el campo donde conoció su pareja y tuvo dos hijos, a lo largo de su vida se enfrentó con varios problemas económicos pues lo que producía no era suficiente para cubrir sus gastos mensuales. 
Hace algunos años inicio con una vaca para comenzar a ser productor  de leche con el tiempo y con ayuda de préstamos logro consolidar su empresa y ser un importante producto de leche en el sector ahora quiere expandirse y comenzar con cultivos pues necesita muchos recursos para darle una buena educación a sus hijos que quieren estudiar algo relacionado con el cuidado delos animales pues han aprendido de su padres a amar los animales.
El crédito que pide lo invertirá en la compra de dos vacas lecheras con las que tiene pronosticado tener una producción y una rentabilidad suficiente para en un periodo de un año comprar una parcela y empezar a cultivar
texts.en:
Armando has lived his whole life in the countryside. He met his wife there and they have two children. He has always struggled to make ends meet as what he earned wasn't sufficient to cover all his monthly expenses.

A few years ago he became a dairy farmer, starting out with just one cow. As time passed and with the help of loans, he managed to grow his business and become an important milk producer in the area. Now Armando wishes to expand and begin farming as he needs much money to provide his children with a good education. They want to study courses related to the care of animals as they have learned from their father to love animals.

The loan Armando is seeking is to buy two milk cows. He expects them to produce enough milk and profits after one year for him to be able to buy a parcel of land and begin to farm it.

loans.use: Buy two milk cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy food such rice, salt, red oil, onions, etc. to resell

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es: Candelaria es una mujer trabajadora de 37 años de edad, Unida, quien vive en el departamento de Sololá. Está solicitado otro préstamo en la asociación, para establecer la otra plantación de cultivos principalmente brócoli y papas. Al inicio no manejaba crédito en ninguna organización, acudía a personas particulares para que le prestaran dinero y poder realizar su actividad productiva pero cada vez era más difícil que le prestaran la misma cantidad. Con el préstamo que la asociación le otorgo ha logrado mantener y cuidar de la cosecha, y ha generado ganancias para poder contribuir a sostener a su familia. Ella está solicitando otro préstamo de Q 3,000.00 para la compra de insumos agrícola, principalmente pilones de brócoli y semillas de papa. La meta que tiene es apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios y verlos graduados.
texts.en:
Candelaria is a hardworking and devoted woman 37 years of age, who lives in the department of Sololá.

She is applying for another loan from the association, to establish another field of crops, primarily broccoli and potatoes. At first, she never took out loans from any organization. She would turn to individuals to loan her money so that she could carry out her business, but each time it was harder to get them to loan her the same amount.

With the loan that the association provided her, she has been able to maintain and care for her crop, and she has generated earnings to be able to help support her family.

She is applying for another loan for Q 3,000.00 to buy agricultural inputs, mainly broccoli and potato seedlings.

Her goal is to support her children in their studies and to see them graduate.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs, primarily broccoli and potato seedlings.

loans.name: Charos

texts.ru: Чарос девушка в возрасте 28 лет проживающая в сельской местности. Чарос замужем и имеет 2 детей. Чарос имеет среднее образование.  Чарос честная, трудолюбивая и ответственная девушка. С детства Чарос привыкла к труду и самостоятельности. Как и все жители сельских местностей она с другими детьми выходила на поле работать по найму. Образование она так и не получила и устроиться на хорошую работу у нее нет возможности. Окончив школу Чарос решила заняться бизнесом. Она  вставала рано и ездила в город за товаром и потом перепродавала на местном базаре. Как говорит сама Чарос «В начале я покупала всего несколько пар носочков и рубашечек и начинала оборот практически с нуля, но постепенно я увеличила свой товарооборот и встала на ноги».  Сейчас Чарос полностью занята торговлей. Муж Чарос ездит по сезону на заработки в Россию и старается обеспечить семью как может. Но тех денег которые зарабатывают муж и Чарос  не достаточно чтоб обеспечить семью и дать достойное образование детям, о котором так мечтает Чарос. Чарос обратилась в «Арванд» за финансовой поддержкой чтоб увеличить свой товарооборот. Она планирует купить новый ассортимент детской  одежды. Она заранее благодарна «Арванд» за предоставленную помощь малообеспеченным жителям сельских местностей.
texts.en: Charos is a 28 year old woman who lives in a rural area. She is married and has two children. She has a high school education and is honest, hardworking, and responsible. Since she was young, she has been used to working and being independent. Like all residents of rural areas, she and the other children worked in the fields. She did not receive a good education and did not have the opportunity to get a good job. After finishing high school, Charos decided to go into business. She got up early and went to the city to buy products and then sold them at the local market. As Charos says herself, "At first I just bought a few shirts and pairs of socks and started with almost nothing, but I gradually increased my sales turnover and got to my feet." She is now selling clothing full time. Her husband works seasonally in Russia and tries to provide for his family as best he can. His earnings are not enough to provide for the family and give the children a good education, which is Charos's dream. She applied for a loan with Arvand for the financial support to increase her sales turnover. She plans to buy new varieties of children's clothing. She thanks Arvand in advance for the assistance it provides to low-income rural residents.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing

loans.name: Muhammadamin

texts.ru:
Мухаммадамин трудолюбивый молодой парень  в возрасте 23 лет. Он женат, но пока еще не имеет детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Мухаммадамин живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он имеет высшее образование. Жена Мухаммадамина также не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей. Мухаммадамин очень любит свою семью и делает всё возможное, чтобы они ни в чём не нуждались.

Чтобы иметь постоянный доход на проживание и пропитание, Мухаммадамин занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Мухаммадамину в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Мухаммадамин хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Мухаммадамин очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Muhammadamin is a hardworking young guy of 23. He is married, but doesn't have any children yet. He turned to Arvand for the first time when he found out that he would be able to receive financial assistance. Muhammadamin himself lives with the family in the countryside. He has a college degree. His wife has no college degree, as she had no opportunity to attend college due to her family's financial difficulties. She is a homemaker. Muhammadamin loves his family and is ready to do anything to provide for them. In order to have a stable income, he started his own business. Muhammadamin raises meat cattle for resale and is able to make a good profit. His wife helps the family by milking the cows and selling milk at the market. Now Muhammadamin wants to expand his herd and has turned to Arvand for a loan. He hopes to be abel to receive the loan and is grateful to Arvand for the support.

loans.use: for purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more goods to sell, including oil, potato, etc.

loans.name: Luz De Mi Vida Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LUZ DE MI VIDA” iniciará el octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Marisol es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: costura de chamarras, tejido de mantas, venta de fajas, tienda de barrio, venta de chalecos, servicio de seguridad, venta de salchipapas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Marisol es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un asesor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió trabajando como vendedora hace varios años, con el pasar del tiempo y con un poco capital inicia un negocio independientemente. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará a pedido de la clienta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta que la institución se preocupe de su bien estar que le ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Luz de mi Vida Community Bank will begin its eighth loan cycle with Pro Mujer. It is part of the Collpani group. There are nine members in the group led by a board of directors with Sra. Marisol as president. The members are involved in a variety of businesses such as sewing jackets, weaving blankets, selling belts, corner store, selling vests, security, selling kebabs.

The loan they are seeking will benefit small businesswomen such as Sra. Marisol. She began working with Pro Mujer a year ago at the invitation of an advisor from the institution who came to her house. She currently runs a business selling clothing, after learning about sales some years ago. As time passed and with a small amount of capital she started her own business.

The loan Marisol is now seeking will be used to buy clothing in bulk from the merchants in the town of El Alto and then resell to her customers. The income she earns will enable her to support her family as she is single and has a son.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she appreciates their concern for her wellbeing.

loans.use: Buy clothing in bulk

loans.name: Nelson Israel

texts.es:
El señor Nelson de 27 años de edad, vive con su esposa, tiene  hijos  que  dependen de él y vive en casa propia en una comunidad de Trojes al Oriente de Honduras.
Don Nelson se dedica desde hace 10  años a la compra y venta de granos básicos y está solicitando el préstamo para comprar maíz y frijoles y así brindar mejor atención a sus clientes también espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante con su familia.
su sueño es ver profesionales a sus hijos.

Trojes, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Nelson is 27 years old. He lives with his wife and has children whom he supports. He lives in his own house in the community of Trojes, in eastern Honduras.

Nelson has been working selling basic grains for the past ten years. He is requesting this loan to buy corn and beans so that he can better serve his customers. He also hopes this investment will allow him and his family to get ahead.

His dream is to see his children become professionals.

Trojes, Honduras - June, 2014

loans.use: to buy corn and beans for his business.

loans.name: Maryory

texts.es:
Maryory inicio su venta de ropa para hombre y dama empíricamente como necesidad de poder darle a su hija de 3 años la alimentación y nutrición adecuada pues al ser una persona de escasos recursos no tiene a la mano muchas herramientas para alimentar correctamente a su hija. 
La edad de su hija se le ha convertido en un impedimento para salir a buscar trabajo por eso inicio con el negocio de venta de mercancía con un capital muy bajo y por su determinación y empeño que le pone a sus ventas ha ido creciendo y tiene buenos pedidos que le ayudaran a generar buen capital para seguir adelante junto con su hija por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de ropa de hombre y dama con la que cubrirá este pedido y ofertara mayores productos a sus clientes haciéndose conocer entre los vecinos y personas que viven alrededor.
Sueña con tener su casa propia y un almacén en un centro comercial y sabe que un gran negocio empezó de 0 e ira formando la idea poco a poco hasta conseguir su cometido y tiene en su hija la principal fuente de inspiración para su vida y dará la suya en beneficio de su hija
texts.en:
Maryory started selling men's and women's clothing strictly out of necessity to be able to give her 3-year old daughter food and adequate nutrition. Being a person of modest means, she does not have access to many resources to feed her daughter properly.

Her daughter's age has held her back from going out to look for work. This is why she started a business selling merchandise with very little capital. Through the determination and resolve she puts into her sales, her business has grown, and she has good orders that help her generate good capital to move forward with her daughter.

This is why she is applying for a loan to buy men's and women's clothing, with which she will fill this order and offer more products to her customers, making herself known to her neighbors and people who live in the area.

She dreams of having her own house and a store in a shopping center. She knows that a great business starts from 0, and she will grow little by little until she reaches her goal. Her daughter is her main source of inspiration in her life, and she will give everything she has to benefit her daughter.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing for men and women.

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.es:
El señor José Félix de 40 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos que  dependen de él,  tiene  casa propia y vive en una comunidad Trojes al oriente de Honduras.
Don José Félix se dedica desde hace  10  años a la compra y venta de granos básicos y está solicitando el préstamo para comprar  maíz y frijoles, espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante con su negocio y con los ingresos poder mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
Don José Félix uno de sus sueños es ver profesionales a sus hijos.

Trojes, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
José Félix is forty years old and lives with his wife and children, whom he supports. He owns his home and lives in the community of Trojes, in eastern Honduras.

José Félix has been working selling basic grains for ten years. He is requesting this loan to buy rice and beans, and he hopes this investment will allow him to keep his business going and that he will be able to use the income he makes to improve his and his family's quality of life a little.

One of José Félix's dreams is to see his children become professionals.

Trojes, Honduras - June, 2014

loans.use: to buy beans and rice for his business.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 2 to 6 years old. She describes herself as focused. She operates a retail business where she sells bread, sugar, soap, and other items. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located in a good market. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, soap, and other items. Her business goal is to open another businesses within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of sugar, bread, soap, and other items

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 5 to 12 years old. She describes herself as dedicated. She operates a retail business where she sells flour, milk, bread, sugar, soap, and other items. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate capital. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, soap, and other items. She hopes that in the future, she will educate her children. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of sugar, bread, soap, and other items

loans.name: Alba Rosibel

texts.es:
El señora Alba de 38 años de edad, vive con su esposo y tiene hijos que dependen de ella, vive en casa propia en una comunidad de Trojes al oriente de Honduras.
Doña Alba tiene 15  años de dedicarse a la ganadería esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de  novillos para repasto y aumentar su producción, espera que con la inversión que realice a su negocio sus ingresos aumenten y le permita mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
Doña Alba uno de sus sueños es ver su hacienda prospera.

 Trojes, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Alba, age 38, lives with her husband, and she has children who are dependent upon her.  She lives in her own house in a community in Trojes in eastern Honduras

Alba has been working with livestock for 15 years.  She is requesting a loan to buy steer to put to pasture and increase her production.  She hopes that by making this investment in her business her income will increase.  This will allow her to improve a little her quality of life and that of her family.

One of Alba’s dreams is to see her farm prosper.


 Trojes, Honduras - June, 2014

loans.use: to buy steer.

loans.name: Maravillosas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MARAVILLOSAS” iniciará el octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Pascuala es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, venta de comida, servicio de transporte, tejido de mantas, venta de condimentos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Pascuala es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un asesor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  tejido de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo implemento hace varios años atrás, aprendiendo la técnica de su tía, ya que le ayudaba en su negocio, con el pasar del tiempo decide implementar su propio negocio. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de máquina de tejer) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará a pedido de la clienta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y el área de salud que le ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The A.C. "MARAVILLOSAS" group, which is starting its eighth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of Focal Collpani Center, consists of nine members and is headed by a board of directors where Mrs. Pascuala is President. The businesses that the community association members run are varied, including: fabric blankets, food sales, shuttle driving, woven blankets, and the sale of spices.

The loan that they are applying for will benefit micro-entrepreneurs where Pascuala is involved. She joined the Pro Mujer group five years ago, at the invitation of an employee of the institution who came to visit her at her home. Today she has a blanket weaving business. She started weaving several years ago, learning the art from her aunt, who she helped with her business. With the passage of time, Pascuala decided to start her own business.
 
The loan is to increase her capital to buy a weaving machine. She will get it from sellers in the city of El Alto and use it to commercialize her production and increase her client base. This work allows her to generate resources to support her family, as she is married and has three children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the training and health education that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy a weaving machine.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be patient. She operates a retail business where she sells flour, milk, bread, sugar, soap, and other items. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located in a marketable area. She describes her biggest business challenge to be seasonal changes. 

She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of flour, sugar, bread, soap, and other items. Her business goal is to have a bigger retail shop within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be victorious. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of flour, sugar, bread, soap, and other items

loans.name: Christabel

texts.en: Christabel is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself as focused. She operates a beauty salon where she offers beauty services. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the 45,000 KES loan to buy three hair dryers. Her business goal is to own a beauty shop within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will build her own house. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to start a boutique.

loans.use: to buy three hair dryers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor to care for her coffee plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farming supplies and to pay for labor costs for her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Erna

texts.en:
Erna works hard to support her family. Erna is married and has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

Erna requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials and gear for her business.

Erna has been in this business for four years now.

Erna would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and gear for her business

loans.name: Jolla

texts.en:
Jolla is 35 years old and single.

Jolla works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

Jolla has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Jolla aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Mizael

texts.en:
Mizael is 40 years old. He is married and has three sons. Mizael owns a house, and he works in the local government and also has a food business in his house that he manages with his wife. 

He is asking for a loan to buy some equipment for his business, such as a freezer, and to do some refurbishing in his house to better accommodate clients. Mizael describes himself as responsible and trustworthy. He says that in the past he has taken some loans and has always paid on time.

loans.use: to buy equipment for his food business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Wendy Carolina

texts.es: Wendy tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de tres años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos en una puuseria de lunes a viernes. Además, los fines de semana trabaja en una tienda cercana a su localidad. Wendy desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc. para ampliar un cuarto dormitorio y para construir la cocina.
texts.en: Wendy, 29, lives in a house she owns with her 3-year-old son. She is a hard-working woman who is employed doing household chores Monday to Friday in a restaurant that sells stuffed tortillas. On the weekends she works at a store near her locality. Wendy wants to improve the living conditions of her home and that is why she is asking for a loan through our field partner, Fusai, to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc to expand a bedroom and to build the kitchen.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc to expand a bedroom and build a kitchen.

loans.name: Roca Fuerte 2014 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROCA FUERTE 2014” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Erika es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, taller de costura, comerciante de alimentos, servicio de construcción, venta de comida.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Erika es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una campaña de promoción de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre quien tiene el mismo negocio. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de víveres por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a ala elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The  Roca Fuerte 2014 Group will start their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal de Panamericana [Pan American Focus Center]. The group is made up on 9 members and is governed by a board with Erika as the Secretary. 

The types of businesses that the members have vary such as: blanket weaving, sewing, trading food, construction services and selling food. 

The loan they received will help small micro businesses where Erika is a member. She states that this is the first time they have reached out to Pro Mujer. 
She joined through a promotional campaign the institute was running. 

Currently she has a business selling food. She has had this business for several years. She learnt the trade from her mother who had the same business. 

The loan will be used to increase capital (buy food at wholesale) which she will acquire from the whole sale vendors in the city of El Alto and later to improving her sales space. 

This type of work allows her to generate income to support her family. She is single and has one son. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she answers she likes the health topics offered by the institution.

loans.use: buy food at whole sale

loans.name: Señor De Ccoyllority De Yungaqui Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE CCOYLLORITY DE YUNGAQUI”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Martha ella es conviviente tiene 25 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche entre otros, a la vez la socia vende pescados y pollos,la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas entre otros.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de llantas, negocio de venta de granos secos y negocio de crianza de animales.
 La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
Las personas que salen con la cara tapada no pertenecen al banco comunal.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “Señor de Ccoyllority de Yungaqui” communal bank.  This bank is located in the Anta district, in the province of Anta and the department of Cusco.

Group member Martha is 25 years old.  She lives with her partner and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily chores and her small grocery store.  She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, and milk, among others.  At the same time, she sells fish and chicken.  She has been doing this work for a long while now, and it is going well for here thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day.  She wants to be able to keep working so that, in this way, she can support her family.

She is asking for this loan to buy sodas, among other items.  She is thankful to those people who are part of her dream through this website and is committed to making her payments according to the established schedule.

The other group members work selling vegetables, selling tires, selling dry grains, and raising animals.  The members who are in the attached photos asked for permission to arrive late to their meeting due to their work.  The people who have their faces covered don’t belong to this communal bank.

loans.use: to buy sodas, among other items.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El socio continua con su negocio de venta de repuestos de automoviles,el socio lleva años dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

El socio solicita le crédito para comprar llantas entre otros.

El socio está feliz con el crédito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues with his business of selling automobile replacement parts.  He has been in this business for years.  It is going well for him thanks to the determination that he puts into his business every day.

The member wishes to be able to continue working.  This way he will continue supporting his family.

The member is requesting a loan to buy tires, among other items.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy tires, among other items.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en: Edwin is a married man. He has one child. He describes himself to be intelligent. He operates a retail business where he sells used oil. He has been involved in this business for three years. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more oil for resale. His business goal is to be prosperous within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will be successful. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more oil for resale

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en: Sophia is a single woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells electronics. She has been involved in this business for 8 years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate finances. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of electronics. Her business goal is to be financially stable within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will excel in business. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of electronics

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en: Vincent is a married man. He has one child. He operates a retail business where he sells electronics. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a busy and populated area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be financial problems. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of electronics. His business goal is to be a wholesaler within five years.

loans.use: to buy more stock of electronics

loans.name: Esil

texts.en:
Esil is a 38-year-old married woman. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Esil has four children who are in school.

Esil has a business selling dried fish in the Philippines. Esil has requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more dried fish to sell to her customers.

Esil has been in this business for four years. In the future, Esil would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more dried fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is a married man. He has six children. He describes himself to be focused. He operates a retail business where he sells sugar, soap, bread, maize flour, cooking fat and other items. He has been involved in this business for 15 years. His primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a lack of capital. He will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, flour, salt and other items he sells. His business goal is to own a wholesale shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will build a permanent house. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, bread, flour, salt and other items

loans.name: Salome

texts.en: Salome is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be dedicated. She operates a farm where she keeps dairy cows that produce milk to sell. She also grows crops. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of capital. She will use the Kes 15,000 loan to buy fertilizer for use on her farm. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to pay school fees for her children. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for use in her farm

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is a married man. He has two children with ages ranging from 6 years to 10 years old. He describes himself to be patient. He operates a carpentry business where he makes chairs, tables and other items. He has been involved in this business for five years. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a lack of funds. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of carpentry materials. His business goal is to be prosperous within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will increase his income. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of carpentry materials

loans.name: Rene Wildon

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal TODOS UNIDOS, él socio sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de auto partes y adornos de autos, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, el socio vende diferentes tipos de faros, llantas entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solcitan, siendo e esta manera que el soco saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de llantas entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Todos Unidos communal bank. He continues in his business of selling auto parts and auto accessories. he is a responsible and hard working person. 

He sells different types of headlights, tires, etc to all his clients that need them. This is how he supports his family. 

He is requesting to loan to buy tires, among others. He is grateful for the loan that was granted, and he pledges to make his payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy tires, among other

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 17 años, 12 años y 11 años de edad. Marta se gana la vida trabajando como operaria desde hace tres años en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Marta desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, lámina galvanizada, ladrillo, piedra, etc.
texts.en:
Marta is 45 and lives in her own home with her life partner and their three children aged 17, 12 and 11. 

Marta earns a living working at a business close to her home. 

She is requesting this loan so that she can build a room in her house. 

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, sand, galvanized steel, bricks, rocks etc.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, galvanized steel, bricks, rocks etc. to build a room in her house.

loans.name: 100 % Charapoto  (Charapoto) Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito 100% Charapoto. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.
La señora Guadalupe es parte de este grupo formado por 10 mujeres y 2 hombres que tiempo atrás se unieron para obtener los beneficios que les brinda la institución, ella  tiene 54 años de edad, está separada pero de esa relación tiene 7 hijos, 6 mayores y uno de 14 años que estudia en colegio. 
Doña Guadalupe es una mujer muy luchadora que con su esfuerzo sale adelante, ella se dedica a la comercio, con la ayuda de uno de sus hijos ella se desplaza hasta la ciudad de Santa Ana a comprar pollos en una granja, luego en su casa los faena y los lleva a la ciudad de Manta lugar donde entrega a restaurantes y tienda de esta ciudad, son muchos los lugares que le compran ya que son clientes por más de 15 años que lleva en esta actividad.
Este crédito es para comprar pollos. Está en el  Grupo De Crédito desde hace 6 ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños son tener un camión pues fleta un carro para su labor.
La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
Every two weeks the 100% Charapoto credit group meets in the city of Charapoto.  This area is known for its traditional culture and also for being just a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province—San Jacinto and San Clemente.

Guadalupe is part of this group made up of ten women and two men who, a while back, got together to get the benefits that the institution gives them.  She is 54 years old.  She is separated, but from that relationship has seven children—six adults and a 14-year-old who is a student.

Guadalupe is a tenacious woman who, through her efforts, is getting ahead.  She works in trade.  With the help of one of her children she goes to the city of Santa Ana to buy chickens from a farm.  Then in her house she slaughters them and takes them to the city of Manta.  There she delivers them to restaurants and stores.  There are many places that buy from her because they have been her customers for more than fifteen years.

This loan is to buy chickens.  She has been in the credit group for six cycles, and she likes it because of the help that they give her with her loans.  Her dream is to own a truck because she hires a car for her work.

The small photo is of a member who couldn’t be there when they took the group photo.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rios Group

texts.es:
Rios se llama este grupo, donde están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, que les permitirá poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lidia, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel  dos, comenta que está en un nivel medio, donde a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo en la venta de ropas es que está saliendo adelante. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que quiere salir adelante por medio de su trabajo y sacrificio.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar ropas variadas para la venta, como ser camisas, pantalones, jeans y demás. Todas ellas agradecen por la ayuda que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The name of this group is Rios. Its members are taking part in the poverty elimination survey, which will let them know the living situation of each one of them.

One of the members is Lidia who, in her last survey, showed a level two of poverty. She mentions that she is in a middle level from which, through her efforts and continuous work selling clothes, she is getting ahead. She is a hard-working person who wants to move forward through her work and sacrifice. She is requesting this loan to be able to buy an assortment of clothes to sell such as shirts, pants, jeans, and the like. 

They are all grateful for the aid they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, jeans, and the like.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough clothes to sell

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself to be innovative. He operates a retail business where he sells cereals. His business is located in a marketable area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be limited stock. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. His business goal is to have a bigger store of cereals within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a prominent business and family. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a female Kiva borrower. She has one child. She describes herself to be a go-getter. She operates a tailoring business where she makes clothes. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in a developing area and her primary customers are regular customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate finances. 

She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. Her business goal is to be a  supplier within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a good business that will sustain her family. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tailoring materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough food to sell.

loans.name: Ana Delis

texts.es:
Ana, ha logrado mejorar la venta de frutas y verduras con ayuda del préstamo anterior, puesto que recupero lo invertido con mejores ganancias, las cuales le han servido para cancelar su deuda y cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
En busca de mantener su negocio bien surtido y cumplir con las nuevas demandas de sus clientes se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para comprar ejotes, pepinos, sandías, papas, manzanas, guineos, plátanos, naranjas, limones, zanahorias, etc.
texts.en:
Ana has been able to improve the sales of fruits and vegetables with the help of the previous loan. She recouped her investment with better profits, which she used to pay off her debt and meet her family’s needs.

In order to keep her stall well stocked and meet her customer’s demands, she decided to request a new loan to buy green beans, cucumbers, watermelons, potatoes, apples, bananas, plantains, oranges, limes, carrots, and the like.

loans.use: to buy green beans, cucumbers, watermelons, potatoes, apples, bananas, plantains, oranges, limes, carrots, and the like.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle

loans.name: María Katerine

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Las Orquídeas  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo de Crédito Mujeres Del Futuro, esta es una zona urbana marginal donde las personas se dedican a diversas actividades.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 38 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 15 y 14 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. 
Doña María para salir adelante hace cuatro años  surtió una pequeña ferretería en su casa donde sus clientes encuentran materiales de construcción y herramientas, ella también vende productos oriflame (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), estos productos los vende en su ferretería y en ocasiones sale a vender por la localidad. De esta forma ella se gana lo suficiente para darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar materiales de construcción y productos oriflame. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le han ayudado mucho para salir adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The "Crédito Mujeres Del Futuro" Group meet every 15 days in the neighborhood of Las Orquídeas  in the city of  Portoviejo. This is an urban area where people work in many different fields. 

This is where Maria lives. She is 38, a single mother of two children aged 15 and 14. They are both in school. 

Four years ago, Maria opened a small hardware store in order to get ahead. It is located in her home where her customers find construction materials and tools. 

She also sells beauty products (cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories). She sells these products in her hardware store and sometimes she sells them around the neighborhood. 

This is how she earns enough to give her children the best. 

She will use this loan to buy construction materials and beauty products. 

She has been with the credit group since the beginning. She likes it because the loans have helped her to get ahead. 

Her dreams are to give her sons the best.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a leather sewing machine and an air compressor.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria Teresa tiene 19 años de edad, vive en el municipio de San Pablo Jocopilas, departamento de Suchitepéquez, es soltera, vive en la casa de sus padres, María es muy trabajdora obtiene sus ingresos haciendo oficios domésticos en casa particulares, lleva ya 6 años de estar realizando esta actividad, María Teresa necesita un crédito por un monto de Q. 8,000.00 para comprar materiales de construcción (hierro, cemento, block, madera entre otros) de vivienda, la meta de ella es tener su casa en mejores condiciones para poder vivir cómodo con sus padres.
texts.en: Maria Teresa is 19 years old. She lives in the municipality of San Pablo Jocopilas, department of Suchitepéquez. She is single and lives in her parents' house. Maria is very hardworking and she earns her income working in domestic chores at private homes. She has already worked in this for 6 years. Maria Teresa needs a loan of Q. 8,000.00 to buy building materials (iron, cement, construction block, wood, and such) for a house. Her goal is to have her house in better conditions in order to live comfortably with her parents.

loans.use: to buy building materials for a house.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is a married woman. She has 3 children. 

She describes herself as business-oriented. She operates a retail business where she sells groceries such as cabbages, potatoes, etc. Her business is located in a developing area and her primary customers are daily customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate finances. 

She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of groceries. Her business goal is to be a supplier within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will own a big grocery.

loans.use: to buy more stock of groceries

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is a married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself as honest and hardworking. 

She operates a retail business where she sells cosmetics. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a marketable area and her primary customers are kind and promising. She describes her biggest business challenge as price fluctuations. 

She will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more stock of cosmetics. Her business goal is to grow big within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will open a boutique. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cosmetics

loans.name: Mamadnazar

texts.ru:
Мамадназар жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 44 лет. Он женат и имеет 3-их детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Мамадназар живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшее образование. Жена Мамадназара также не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей. С юных лет Мамадназар помогал своему отцу растить скот,  и так он набрался много опыта в этом деле.

На сегодня, чтобы иметь хороший доход на пропитание, Мамадназар самостоятельно занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Мамадназару в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Мамадназар хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Мамадназар очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Mamadnazar is a happy and hardworking 44-year-old man. He is married and has 3 children. He came to Arvand for the first time once he learned that there was an opportunity to obtain financial support. Mamadnazar lives with his family in a rural area. He does not have a higher education. Mamadnazar's wife also does not have a higher education because she did not have an opportunity to study at a university due to family's financial hardships, and is now a homemaker, involved in household work and raising the children. Since a young age, Mamadnazar had helped his father to raise livestock and this is how he gained a lot of experience in this business.

Today, in order to have a good income for living, Mamadnazar is independently involved in his own business. He fattens up and sells cattle. His wife also helps him with the business by selling milk, obtained from the livestock. Now, Mamadnazar wants to increase his livestock headcount in order to expand his business. This is why he came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock. Mamadnazar hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine, an over sewing machine and an iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more drinks to sell.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru:
Шоира позитивная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 37 лет. Она замужем, но пока не имеет детей по состоянию здоровья. Живёт она в небольшом сельском посёлке. С детства Шоира мечтала стать учительницей, но так сложились обстоятельства, что она не смогла получить высшего образования из-за финансовой недостаточности в семье. Сразу после окончания средней школы Шоиру выдали замуж. И так она стала домохозяйкой. Но, даже находясь постоянно  дома,  Шоира никогда не сидит без дела. Она вместе с мужем стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы обеспечивать себя и своих родителей всем необходимым.

Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Шоира вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Шоира выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Шоира получает хороший доход. Муж Шоиры также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Шоира с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Шоира заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Shoira is a positive and hardworking 37-year-old woman. She is married, but does not yet have children due to her health conditions. She lives in a small rural village. Since childhood, Shoira dreamed of becoming a teacher, but circumstances did not allow her to get a higher education due to financial difficulties in her family. Shoira was married off right after graduating from secondary school. And this is how she became a homemaker, but even while always staying at home, Shoira did not sit without doing anything. She and her husband try to do everything possible to provide themselves and their parents with all of the necessities.

In order to have a regular income for living, Shoira and her husband started their own business. They are involved in animal husbandry. Shoira raises livestock and then sells milk and meat obtained from the livestock. Shoira earns a good income from this business. Shoira's husband also works at a local repair shop, and his work yields an additional income for the family. Their combined income is sufficient to live at a middle-class level, but they still do not have enough to cover all of their needs. Currently, Shoira and her husband want to buy several more heads of livestock for fattening up. This is why Shoira came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock. Shoira thanks Arvand in advance for the support that would subsequently improve the family's quality of living.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a gas cooker for domestic use

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase frozen foods.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: Santiago es una personas de 48 años de edad, Casado, quien tiene ocho hijos, cuatro mujeres y cuatro varones, quienes viven en el departamento de Sololá. Su actividad principal es la agricultura, cultiva hortalizas de ciclo corto (zanahoria, papa, cebolla y coliflor), eligió esta actividad ya que sus padres le heredaron la experiencia de todo el proceso productivo y la comercialización de cada uno de los productos,  además realiza trabajo de jornalero en actividades de mantenimiento de hortalizas, así obtiene sus ingresos para apoyar al sostenimiento de su familia. El está solicitando un préstamo de Q 4,500.00 para la compra de insumos agrícolas (semillas de zanahoria y fertilizantes), para incrementar el rendimiento del cultivo. La meta a es brindar a su familia alimentos nutritivos para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Santiago is a 48 year old man. He is married and has eight children - four women and four men - who live in the Sololá department. His main activity is agriculture: he grows short-cycle crops (carrots, potatoes, onions and cauliflower). 

He chose this profession because he inherited the experience of the entire productive process, and the selling of each product, from his parents. He also earns money as a day laborer, doing work maintaining vegetables. This is how he earns his income to support his family's sustenance. 

He's seeking a loan of 4,500 Guatemalan quetzales to buy agricultural inputs (carrot seeds and fertilizer) to increase crop yield. The goal is to bring his family nutritious food to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to grow carrots.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine and an air-conditioner.

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en: Teresia is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be smart, innovative and ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells handbags, school bags, and dresses. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a marketable area and her primary customers are regular. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of handbags, school bags and dresses. Her business goal is to own a big international boutique within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will educate her children. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of handbags, school bags and dresses

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en: Jackline is a single woman. She describes herself to be visionary. She operates a tailoring business where she makes sweaters. She has been involved in this business for three years. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of capital. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tailoring materials

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells water. She has been involved in this business for 1 year. Her business is located in a populated area and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low demand in rain season. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a cart for transporting water. Her business goal is to grow into a large enterprise within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy a cart for transporting water

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгуль 30 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. У Назгуль - высшее образование, по специальности бухгалтер, после окончания университета она вышла замуж и начала заниматься животноводством. Назгуль имеет очень хорошие отзывы от своих соседей. Они отзываются о ней как о доброй и трудолюбивой женщине.  Благодаря упорному труду, Назгуль смогла развить и расширить свою деятельность, которая на сегодняшний день  приносит около 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Доходы от бизнеса позволили Назгуль начать строительство собственного дома. В целях завершения строительства, Назгуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на установку системы отопления, на проведение водоснабжения для питьевых нужд, а также внутреннюю и внешнюю обделку стен. В будущем Назгуль планирует увеличить поголовье скота, полученная прибыль поможет вырастить и обучить детей в хороших условиях.
texts.en: Nazgul is 30 years old, married and has 3 children. Nazgul has a higher education and is an accountant. She graduated from a university, got married and became involved in animal husbandry. Nazgul receives good feedback from her neighbors. They say that she is a kind and hardworking woman. Thanks to her hard work, Nazgul was able to develop and expand her business, which today yields approximately 20,000 som (KGS) per month, and serves as the basis for covering food and consumer needs of the family. The earnings from the business allowed Nazgul to start building her own house. In order to complete the construction, Nazgul requested a loan from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to install a heating system, to create a water supply for drinking needs, and also to provide indoor and outdoor wall linings. In the future, Nazgul plans to increase livestock headcount, so that the resulting profit would help raise and educate her children in good conditions.

loans.use: to install a heating system, to create a water supply for drinking needs, and also to provide indoor and outdoor wall linings

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Bowalohng

texts.en: Mrs. Bowalohng is 50 years old and has one husband and three children. She is a mother, and a sticky rice farmer.  Her village takes water from wells, from rainwater collection systems, and from local streams. The water in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Most families also report both time and money saved as they do not need to boil water for consumption after buying a filter.  Mrs. Bowalohng earns a small commission from the sale of each water filter, which she will use to care for her children and to send each of them to school. Mrs. Bowalohng is expecting to sell 5 filters each month; providing clean water to an average of 30 people each month. Mrs. Bowalohng is very enthusiastic about the opportunity to help her neighbors and fellow villagers improve their health through a convenient, simple, and effective method to treat contaminated water.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can sell them in nearby villages

loans.name: Boonyoke

texts.en: Mr. Boonyoke is 64 years old and has one wife and three children. He is a sticky rice farmer and he raises livestock. His village takes water from wells and from the local streams. The water in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Mr. Boonyoke earns a small commission from the sale of each water filter, which he will use to care for his extended family.  Mr. Boonyoke is expecting to sell 5 filters each month; providing clean water to an average of 30 people each month. Mr. Boonyoke is very enthusiastic about the opportunity to help his neighbors and fellow villagers improve their health through the provision of uncontaminated water.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can sell them in nearby villages

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a table and an over sewing machine.

loans.name: Khamtah

texts.en: Mr. Khamtah is 60 years old and has a wife and six children. Mr. Khamtah works very hard to provide for his family – he is a sticky rice farmer and raises some livestock in addition to selling water filters. Mr. Khamtah’s village uses surface water, well water, and rain water but the water is unsuitable to drink. The nearby villages use similar water sources but, like his own village, the water in these places is contaminated with bacteria and other water spread disease. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter that is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Mr. Khamtah is expecting to sell approximately 5 filters each month; providing clean water to an average of 30 people per month. He will make a small commission from the sale of each water filter; the commission helps him support his extended family. Mr. Khamtah is encouraged by how the filter helps provide clean water, assist villagers improve their overall health, and how it helps provide additional income for him, his wife, and family members.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can sell them in nearby villages

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an iron and an over sewing machine.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is married with five children and all of them go to school. She takes care of additional family members (old parents). She has a business of selling green bananas and yellow bananas. She has applied for a loan of 200,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bunches of green and yellow bananas. She generates additional income from tailoring and poultry farming. She works from home six days out of every week and sells on retail basis only. Her major business challenge includes seasonality and thieves. She aspires to become a wholesaler and to own 2000 chickens.  She resides in the family house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes  school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green and yellow bananas to sell

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is a married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself to be ambitious. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using a tuk tuk. He has been involved in this business for 6 years. His business is located in a populated area which is good for business and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be mechanical challenges. 

He will use the KES 50,000 loan to service his tuk tuk. His business goal is to buy a vehicle within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will be successful. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to service his tuk tuk.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a married woman. She has 4 children. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a tailoring business where she makes clothes. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate financing. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. Her business goal is to be financially stable within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will excel in business. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of tailoring materials

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is a married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself to be active. She operates a tailoring business where she makes dresses. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are regulars. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. Her business goal is to expand within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to take care of her family. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of tailoring materials

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en: Veronicah is a married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself to be kind. She operates a retail business where she sells vegetables and cereals. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. Her business is located in a productive area and her primary customers are regulars. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inflation. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy more stock of vegetables and cereals. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of vegetables and cereals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a generator an a sewing machine, and to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an air-cooler and generator.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and air conditioner and renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough slippers to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bags to sell.

loans.name: Salomon

texts.es: Don salomón quien se dedica a su negocio de pulpería en su casa de habitación, actualmente está solicitando el apoyo de crédito con el objetivo de terminar lo que ya había empezado con créditos anteriores, las paredes y cuarto, este ultimo desea destinarlo para alquiler, ya que de esta manera podrá obtener una ayuda más de ingresos, gracias al financiamiento podrá comprar los materiales como cemento, arena, bloques, hierro y continuar la obra.
texts.en: Salomon has a grocery store located in his house.  He is requesting a loan in order to finish the work that was started with his previous loans, namely the walls and the bedroom.  The latter is intended to be rented out, so that he can earn more income.  Thanks to the loan he can buy materials such as cement, sand, cinder blocks, and rebar, and continue the work.

loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, rebar, and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of ingredients for preparing food.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a married man. He has one child. He describes himself to be a risk taker. He operates a retail business where he sells potatoes and carrots. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in an area with potential and his primary customers are daily customers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of enough capital.

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of potatoes. His business goal is to expand within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will create employment. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is a married woman. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 3 years to 11 years. She describes herself to be obedient. She operates a restaurant where she cooks food for sale. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough capital. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy cooking utensils. Her business goal is to expand within 5 years. She hopes that in the future she will create jobs.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils.

loans.name: Teresiah

texts.en: Teresiah is a married woman. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 6 years to 20 years. She describes herself to be business oriented. She operates a poultry farm where she produces eggs for sale. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in a developed area and her primary customers are regulars.
